game.name: Hammer
game.description:
Fighting alone is not easy especially when you are on a special mission. In such a situation, even your single mistake could cause a loss in the battle. Your alertness and agility help make your way towards the victory. Grab your gun and roll your sleeves up to clear the city from all the bad souls in this fast-paced action challenge! These bad guys are very fast and will start shooting at you when they see you on the road.

Your blood is very precious so do not let it flow when your city needs it the most. You will carry your gun all the time. Feel free to use anything parked cars, own weapons and peacefully standing tank! These bad souls can attack you from any place like behind the standing vehicles, over the top of the buildings, and various other locations. Guide your character through all the unique and addictive 30 levels in this one of the best shooting games for boys!

There are multiple achievements, multiple beautiful magazine of weapons and other cool stuff to explore and use. The colourful background, lots of skyscrapers, different streets and multiple weapons will be enough to keep you engrossed for hours. Go through our extensive list of free action-packed challenges to spot the ones that talk about the more fun and entertainment! Good luck experiencing an immersive gaming experience, no download required!

game.webControlKeys: R CLICK TO BOMB,SHIFT LEFT -PAUSE,SPACE TO JUMP,LEFT MOUSE CLICK TO HIT,W,A,S,D AND ALL ARROWS TO MOVE,MOUSE WHEELS TO RELOAD THE GUN
